Reviews.Title: Great TV for teenage boys
Reviews.Author: jazzyj
Reviews.Content: This is a very good low end LCD tv for kids rooms.  I bought one for one of my sons for his birthday.  I liked it so much I bought one for my other child.  They both play video games on them amd say they look great.  Excellent buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: Will not work with the BOSE SOLO Speaker System
Reviews.Author: Ray D. Ator
Reviews.Content: I was loaned this TV while my Sony TV was in the shop. The first thing I needed to do was to hook up the Samsung to my BOSE SOLO sound system so I could enjoy the sound instead of listening to the tinny little speakers that come with the Samsung. However, Samsung did not include a port on the back for either an optical digital audio cable nor a coaxial digital audio cable! They did provide a port for an analog stereo audio cable but come on, it's 2013, not 1973!So I hooked up a set of analog stereo audio cables (that have the old style RCA plugs at each end) but the TV did not play through them because there is no way to turn off the built-in stereo speakers. There was also no way to turn on the audio out jacks on the back of the Samsung TV set. They forgot to add this option to the on-screen menu that allows the user to customize their TV viewing the way they want.Then I contacted Samsung technical support. They told me that this model TV does not have an output port and so it cannot be connected to any external speakers at all.All I know is that in the future I will not even consider looking at a Samsung TV. I know that people loved these TVs in children's bedrooms or as a monitor for their X-BOXes, but that shows the limitations of these units.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Z bro
Reviews.Content: Samsung is at it again with thier great televisions.  The picture is awesome.  I have it connected to a ps3 and games and blurays are awesome.  The sound isnt the best but what do you expect from a tv without a reciecer connected to it.  I have it mouted and it is perfect.  Bought It through the warehouse as I do a lot woth no problems whatsoever.  I also like the nice buttons it has. They are not actuals buttons that you push. You just swipe your finger past it amd it works..  great for am extra room bedroom or kitchen..

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Russell E. Biaggi
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for use as both a monitor for my computer and to hook-up to my DirectV. Plus my XBox360. Set-up was quick and easy and i have no complains at all. Quality product. Outstanding Picture and Sound.

Reviews.Title: Good product, seller not so much
Reviews.Author: Christy A Eaton
Reviews.Content: We think this was a floor model because of the way the TV was packaged, lots of fingerprints etc. The brand is good though this is our second Samsung in four years so if this one dies on us, no more Samsung. Lots and lots of issues with the seller but in the end (after many weeks) everything was worked out...could've been a lot worse!

Reviews.Title: Buy it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Edwin Rivera
Reviews.Content: I purchased The Samsung 32in for my two little nephews and they are very happy with it. The order arrived a couple of days before it was scheduled to arrive and I saved a lot of money buying the Samsung 32in on this site....
